channel.title: Using Map Campaigner on HOT-PDC Training Site
channel.description: Recent content in Using Map Campaigner on HOT-PDC Training Site

item.title: Using Map Campaigner to Manage Mapping Campaign
item.description: Learning Objectives: Knowing and understanding how to work with Map Campaigners Operating Map Campaigners to create mapping activities Operate Map Campaigners to monitor mapping activities In implementing a mapping project you often need a report regarding the progress of the activity in a statistical data about how many objects have been mapped in the activity. There are several tools that can be used to obtain statistical data. One of the tools that we will learn today is Map Campaigner.
